titles.title: A bill to designate a portion of the Rappahannock River in the Commonwealth of Virginia as the "John W. Warner Rapids".

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S8416)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

bill.summary:
9/11/2008--Introduced.
Designates a portion of the Rappahannock River comprised of the manmade rapids located at the site of the former Embrey Dam in Fredericksburg, Virginia, as the John W. Warner Rapids.
